msg: invalid name may not be blank
invalid material type=wrong-type must be structural or plasma-facing
invalid neutron source=XT must be D-T or D-D
invalid neutron wall loading=39.0 must be ITER or DEMO
invalid availability factor=101.0 must not be greater than 100
invalid bare tile=x must be yes, no, true, false
invalid homogenized wcll=Yup must be yes, no, true, false
invalid homogenized hcpb=Nope must be yes, no, true, false
invalid density=1e+16 must be between 0 and 25 g/cm3
unknown nuclide or element in cell=C7
either Weight % or Atom % must be provided for component=C13
Weight % Target=5.0 must not be greater than Max=4.0 for component=Cr
Weight % Max must not be 0 for component=W
Weight % Target=65.0 must not be less than Min=66.0 for component=Fe
Weight % Max must be provided with Min for component=Si
Weight % Target=10.0 must not be greater than Max=9.0 for component=Li
Weight % Target must not be negative in cell=-10.0 for component=Cu
Weight % Max=10.0 must not be less than Min=11.0 for component=O
provide Weight % or Atom % not both for component=Fl
Weight % Target must not be greater than 100 in cell=101.0 for component=Mn
